title: Authors and Citation
text: Raphael Saldanha. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Saldanha R (2024). plugfieldapi: Plugfield API wrapper retrieve data weather stations. R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://rfsaldanha.github.io/plugfieldapi/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {plugfieldapi: Plugfield API wrapper to retrieve data from weather stations},   author = {Raphael Saldanha},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://rfsaldanha.github.io/plugfieldapi/}, }

what: Plugfield API wrapper to retrieve data from weather stations
title: Plugfield API wrapper to retrieve data from weather stations
text: package contains function access Plugfield API retrieve data weather stations.

title: Plugfield API wrapper to retrieve data from weather stations
Plugfield API wrapper to retrieve data from weather stations
text: retrieve data weather stations need logged . need username, password x-api-key, provided Plugfield.

title: Plugfield API wrapper to retrieve data from weather stations
text: may pass credentials manually login() function

title: Plugfield API wrapper to retrieve data from weather stations
text: Store login credentials renviron file (usethis::edit_r_environ()), using keys plugfield_username, plugfield_password plugfield_x_api_key. forget reset R session. , login function automatically load credentials information. forget login, data retrieval functions try login automatically, using renviron keys.

title: Plugfield API wrapper to retrieve data from weather stations
text: Use device_list() function retrieve list devices connected account. , device id, use function device_info() retrieve information specific device device_sensors function get table sensors available specific device.

title: Plugfield API wrapper to retrieve data from weather stations
text: may use functions data_daily() data_hourly() retrieve time-aggregated data, function data_sensor() retrieve granular data specific sensor.

title: Plugfield API wrapper to retrieve data from weather stations
text: package respects API restriction 5 requests per second.

title: Daily aggregated data — data_daily
text: Daily aggregated data

title: Daily aggregated data — data_daily
text: deviceId integer. device identification code (id). begin character. Start date. Use format day/month/year. Example: 20/09/2024 end character. End date. Use format day/month/year. Example: 20/09/2024 as_list logical. TRUE function return list, otherwise, tibble.

title: Daily aggregated data — data_daily
text: list tibble, depending as_list argument.

title: Hourly aggregated data — data_hourly
text: Hourly aggregated data

title: Hourly aggregated data — data_hourly
text: deviceId integer. device identification code (id). begin character. Start date time. Use format day/month/year hour. Example: 20/09/2024 09 end character. End date time. Use format day/month/year hour. Example: 20/09/2024 09 as_list logical. TRUE function return list, otherwise, tibble.

title: Hourly aggregated data — data_hourly
text: list tibble, depending as_list argument.

title: Data from sensor — data_sensor
text: Retrieve data sensor device

title: Data from sensor — data_sensor
code: data_sensor(deviceId, sensor, time = NULL, timeMax = NULL)

title: Data from sensor — data_sensor
text: deviceId integer. device identification code (id). sensor integer. sensor code, informed device_sensors(). time character. Start date time. provided, function return data last day. Use format day/month/year hour. Example: 20/09/2024 09 timeMax character. End date time. provided, function return data last day. Use format day/month/year hour. Example: 20/09/2024 09

title: Data from sensor — data_sensor
text: tibble.

title: Device info — device_info
text: Retrieve information specific device, including last updated data dashboard.

title: Device info — device_info
text: deviceId integer. device identification code (id).

title: Device info — device_info
text: list.

title: Device list — device_list
text: Returns list available devices, including device's information last updated data dashboard.

title: Device list — device_list
text: list.

title: Device sensors — device_sensors
text: Retrieve sensors available device id.

title: Device sensors — device_sensors
text: deviceId integer. device identification code (id).

title: Device sensors — device_sensors
text: tibble.

title: Login on Plugfield — login
text: may supply manually username, password x-api-key, store values renviron document. , use function usethis::edit_r_environ() add following keys: plugfield_username, plugfield_password plugfield_x_api_key.

title: Login on Plugfield — login
code: login(username = NULL, password = NULL, x_api_key = NULL)

title: Login on Plugfield — login
text: username character. Username, usually e-mail. password character. x_api_key character. Provided Plugfield.

title: Login on Plugfield — login
text: object return due nature function.
